LanguageData.RTDC_EnableModDesc: If disabled, all functionality will stop.
LanguageData.RTDC_ShowHistoryTabDesc: If disabled, you must open the history window via Mod Settings.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableRimTalkNameColoringDesc: Colorize names in the RimTalk top header. Note: Names are not bolded to prevent layout misalignment.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableChatColoringDesc: Content in chat bubbles and logs will be colored.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableBubblesSyncDesc: If Interaction Bubbles is installed, bubbles will also be colored.
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoExportHistoryDesc: Automatically save as HTML and clear when limit (200) is reached. If disabled, log clears without saving.
LanguageData.RTDC_OpenHistoryWindowDesc: Open a standalone, resizable window to view and manage history. This significantly improves settings menu performance.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableForFriendliesDesc: Enable for allies and neutral factions
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableForNonHumansDesc: If enabled, animals or mechs using speech tools will also have colored names.
LanguageData.RTDC_UseFactionColorDesc: If no custom name exists, attempt to use the pawn's faction color.
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoFavColorDesc: If Biotech DLC is enabled, attempt to use the favorite color from pawn genes.
LanguageData.RTDC_AutoApplyBoldDesc: Whether automatically acquired colors should be bold by default.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableSelfTalkColorDesc: Treat text inside brackets ()（）** 【】 as actions or thoughts and colorize them.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableRainbowDesc: Speech turns rainbow-colored after drinking a specific potion.
LanguageData.RTDC_EnableBWDesc: Speech turns black and white after drinking a specific potion.
LanguageData.RTDC_ManageNamesDesc: Enter a name (e.g., Rat) and click Add. Highest priority.
LanguageData.RTDC_ManageKeywordsDesc: Keywords appearing in dialogue will be automatically colored.
LanguageData.RTDC_HistoryInfo: Note: System keeps max 200 recent entries. Old entries are auto-cleared when limit is reached.
LanguageData.RTDC_PathInvalid: Invalid path! Ensure it exists and format is correct.
LanguageData.RTDC_DrinkSoup: drank the magic soup and feels their speech changing!
